problem_names:
lemma d_dist_Sum:
  "ascending_chain f \<Longrightarrow> d(Sum f) = Sum (\<lambda>n . d(f n))"

lemma d_dist_Prod:
  "descending_chain f \<Longrightarrow> d(Prod f) = Prod (\<lambda>n . d(f n))"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ascending_chain f \<Longrightarrow>
    descending_chain (\<lambda>n. a (f n))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. descending_chain f \<Longrightarrow>
    ascending_chain (\<lambda>n. a (f n))

lemma d_dist_Sum:
  "ascending_chain f \<Longrightarrow> d(Sum f) = Sum (\<lambda>n . d(f n))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ascending_chain f \<Longrightarrow>
    d (complete_tests_class.Sum f) =
    complete_tests_class.Sum (\<lambda>n. d (f n))
by (simp add: d_def a_ascending_chain a_dist_Prod a_dist_Sum)

lemma d_dist_Prod:
  "descending_chain f \<Longrightarrow> d(Prod f) = Prod (\<lambda>n . d(f n))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. descending_chain f \<Longrightarrow>
    d (complete_tests_class.Prod f) =
    complete_tests_class.Prod (\<lambda>n. d (f n))
by (simp add: d_def a_dist_Sum a_dist_Prod a_descending_chain)
